responsibilities: Developed an app that makes new employees on-boarding easier using Power Apps and Power Automate.
Submitted a pull request that resolved a critical bug in an open source plugin used by the team.
Implemented a powershell script to check security settings changes and integrated it in Azure DevOps pipeline.
Integrated code components and custom code in Javascript using React Framework into model-driven apps.
Performed Fortify scans to detect, generate reports and fix security vulnerabilities in code.
Developed a web application that generates educational plans using AI with the Mistral LLM, including file and sub-folder management to enhance educational organization.
Implemented the REST API with FastApi and PostgreSQL in Python, optimizing data management and security, and hosted it with AWS EC2 (Linux/Ubuntu).
Designed the user interface, also mobile-friendly, with Angular and Node.js, based on Figma designs with HTML and SCSS.
Established CI/CD pipelines, speeding up deployment cycles and managed tasks on Gitlab Issues within an Agile methodology.
Contributed to the initial design of the AAA game 'The Bird That Drinks Tears', in an Agile environment and using Jira for task management.
Implemented game mechanics such as attacks and movements in Unreal Engine 5.2, using Blueprint for rapid prototyping.
Developed a health and cheat system in C++, enhancing game stability and enriching UX.
Designed a generic detection system with Octree in C++, using Geometric Tools to improve performance and game fluidity.
Optimized the user interface of the game Jurassic World The Game in C++, significantly increasing satisfaction for over 20M users with visual and functional improvements.
Worked closely with artists and designers to integrate new gameplay features, with a technical design document for each.
Developed a dynamic button in C++, Json, and VBA, providing designers the flexibility to adjust the UI in real-time, improving UX.
Managed a team of 10 animators, scheduling and training new members.
Supervised the work methods of animators, ensuring effective management of resources and activities.

experience.role: Host of virtual and in-person general assemblies
responsibilities: Directed over 200 general assemblies with more than 100 co-owners, explaining platform functionalities to participants for smooth proceedings.
Collaborated with lawyers to optimize voting processes, improving the efficiency of general assemblies.

projects.title: Data Visualization in Python
projects.description: Developed a website in Javascript and FastApi that displays individual and overall team statistics for the Ivory Coast football team during AFCON 2023, with Plotly and using data from fbref.com.

projects.title: Creation of Custom Android ROMs
projects.description: Designed and developed custom ROMs and kernels for Huawei P9 lite and Honor 5C, using C++, C, and Shell. This project led to significant performance and customization improvements for over 1,000 users.

projects.title: Scrabble: Cross-platform Web and Android App
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform Scrabble web app, in a multi-service architecture, as part of a team of 5. Implemented the Express server with the Socket.IO library and designed user profiles with Firebase and Firestore.
